Html:
Hi,

Thank you for this great library.
I'm working on a project that needs driving route with real-time travel time (incorporating delays from current traffic).
I'm wondering if the code below is real-time travel time or not.
RoutingProvider rp = GMapProviders.GoogleMap;
MapRoute route = rp.GetRoute(p1,p2,false, false,5)
MessageBox.Shote(route.Name);
If the return travel-time above is not real-time data, how can I get it from this library?

Thank you very much
